1: שִׁ֥יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>A Song</n> הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <sup>4609 </sup> <n>of degrees</n> לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> גָבַ֣הּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>is not haughty</n> לִ֭בִּי <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> רָמ֣וּ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>lofty</n> עֵינַ֑י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>nor mine eyes</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הִלַּ֓כְתִּי ׀ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>neither do I exercise</n> בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <sup>1419 </sup> <n>myself in great matters</n> וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <sup>6381 </sup> <n>or in things too high</n> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>too</n>
2: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שִׁוִּ֨יתִי ׀ <sup>7737 </sup> <n>Surely I have behaved</n> וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <sup>1826 </sup> <n>and quieted</n> נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>myself</n> כְּ֭גָמֻל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>as a child that is weaned</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>child against</n> אִמּ֑וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>of his mother</n> כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>[is] even as a weaned child</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>within</n> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n>
3: יַחֵ֣ל <sup>3176 </sup> <n>hope</n> יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Let Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>in</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>this</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>from henceforth and for</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n>
